pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon Neo Alpha
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons: The Last Judgement (2018, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_neo_alpha)Neo Amazons Driver (Neo Alpha)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VIII$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Regeneration III$(li)Jump Boost$(li)Strength XI (with empty hand)
